snippet: Attacks across Iraq on Monday hit commercial areas and Iraqi security forces, killing at least 15 people and wounding dozens, officials said.
abstract: Attacks across Iraq hit commercial areas and Iraqi security forces, killing at least 15 people and wounding dozens.
lead_paragraph: Attacks across Iraq on Monday hit commercial areas and Iraqi security forces, killing at least 15 people and wounding dozens, officials said.

headline.main: Iraq: Attacks Kill at Least 15 People
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Attacks Kill at Least 15 People
